verses.plain: Fret not thyself because of evildoers, neither be thou envious against the workers of iniquity.

tokens.t: Fret not thyself because of evildoers, neither be thou envious against the workers of iniquity.

verses.plain: For they shall soon be cut down like the grass, and wither as the green herb.

tokens.t: For they shall soon be cut down like the grass, and wither as the green herb.

verses.plain: Trust in the LORD, and do good; so shalt thou dwell in the land, and verily thou shalt be fed.

tokens.t: Trust in the
, and do good;
shalt thou dwell in the land, and verily thou shalt be fed.

verses.plain: Delight thyself also in the LORD; and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart.

tokens.t: Delight thyself also in the
; and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart.

verses.plain: Commit thy way unto the LORD; trust also in him; and he shall bring it to pass.

tokens.t: Commit thy way unto the
; trust also in him; and he shall bring
to pass.

verses.plain: And he shall bring forth thy righteousness as the light, and thy judgment as the noonday.

tokens.t: And he shall bring forth thy righteousness as the light, and thy judgment as the noonday.

verses.plain: Rest in the LORD, and wait patiently for him: fret not thyself because of him who prospereth in his way, because of the man who bringeth wicked devices to pass.

tokens.t: Rest in the
, and wait patiently for him: fret not thyself because of him who prospereth in his way, because of the man who bringeth wicked devices to pass.

verses.plain: Cease from anger, and forsake wrath: fret not thyself in any wise to do evil.

tokens.t: Cease from anger, and forsake wrath: fret not thyself in any wise to do evil.

verses.plain: For evildoers shall be cut off: but those that wait upon the LORD, they shall inherit the earth.

tokens.t: For evildoers shall be cut off: but those that wait upon the
, they shall inherit the earth.

verses.plain: For yet a little while, and the wicked shall not be: yea, thou shalt diligently consider his place, and it shall not be.

tokens.t: For yet a little while, and the wicked
not
yea, thou shalt diligently consider his place, and it
not

verses.plain: But the meek shall inherit the earth; and shall delight themselves in the abundance of peace.

tokens.t: But the meek shall inherit the earth; and shall delight themselves in the abundance of peace.

verses.plain: The wicked plotteth against the just, and gnasheth upon him with his teeth.

tokens.t: The wicked plotteth against the just, and gnasheth upon him with his teeth.

verses.plain: The Lord shall laugh at him: for he seeth that his day is coming.

tokens.t: The Lord shall laugh at him: for he seeth that his day is coming.

verses.plain: The wicked have drawn out the sword, and have bent their bow, to cast down the poor and needy, and to slay such as be of upright conversation.

tokens.t: The wicked have drawn out the sword, and have bent their bow, to cast down the poor and needy,
to slay such as be of upright conversation.

verses.plain: Their sword shall enter into their own heart, and their bows shall be broken.

tokens.t: Their sword shall enter into their own heart, and their bows shall be broken.

verses.plain: A little that a righteous man hath is better than the riches of many wicked.

tokens.t: A little that a righteous man hath
better than the riches of many wicked.

verses.plain: For the arms of the wicked shall be broken: but the LORD upholdeth the righteous.

tokens.t: For the arms of the wicked shall be broken: but the
upholdeth the righteous.

verses.plain: The LORD knoweth the days of the upright: and their inheritance shall be for ever.

tokens.t: The
knoweth the days of the upright: and their inheritance shall be for ever.

verses.plain: They shall not be ashamed in the evil time: and in the days of famine they shall be satisfied.

tokens.t: They shall not be ashamed in the evil time: and in the days of famine they shall be satisfied.

verses.plain: But the wicked shall perish, and the enemies of the LORD shall be as the fat of lambs: they shall consume; into smoke shall they consume away.

tokens.t: But the wicked shall perish, and the enemies of the
as the fat of lambs: they shall consume; into smoke shall they consume away.

verses.plain: The wicked borroweth, and payeth not again: but the righteous sheweth mercy, and giveth.

tokens.t: The wicked borroweth, and payeth not again: but the righteous sheweth mercy, and giveth.

verses.plain: For such as be blessed of him shall inherit the earth; and they that be cursed of him shall be cut off.

tokens.t: For
blessed of him shall inherit the earth; and
cursed of him shall be cut off.

verses.plain: The steps of a good man are ordered by the LORD: and he delighteth in his way.

tokens.t: The steps of a
man are ordered by the
: and he delighteth in his way.

verses.plain: Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the LORD upholdeth him with his hand.

tokens.t: Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the
upholdeth
his hand.

verses.plain: I have been young, and now am old; yet have I not seen the righteous forsaken, nor his seed begging bread.

tokens.t: I have been young, and
am old; yet have I not seen the righteous forsaken, nor his seed begging bread.

verses.plain: He is ever merciful, and lendeth; and his seed is blessed.

tokens.t: ever merciful, and lendeth; and his seed
blessed.

verses.plain: Depart from evil, and do good; and dwell for evermore.

tokens.t: Depart from evil, and do good; and dwell for evermore.

verses.plain: For the LORD loveth judgment, and forsaketh not his saints; they are preserved for ever: but the seed of the wicked shall be cut off.

tokens.t: For the
loveth judgment, and forsaketh not his saints; they are preserved for ever: but the seed of the wicked shall be cut off.

verses.plain: The righteous shall inherit the land, and dwell therein for ever.

tokens.t: The righteous shall inherit the land, and dwell therein for ever.

verses.plain: The mouth of the righteous speaketh wisdom, and his tongue talketh of judgment.

tokens.t: The mouth of the righteous speaketh wisdom, and his tongue talketh of judgment.

verses.plain: The law of his God is in his heart; none of his steps shall slide.

tokens.t: The law of his God
in his heart; none of his steps shall slide.

verses.plain: The wicked watcheth the righteous, and seeketh to slay him.

tokens.t: The wicked watcheth the righteous, and seeketh to slay him.

verses.plain: The LORD will not leave him in his hand, nor condemn him when he is judged.

tokens.t: The
will not leave him in his hand, nor condemn him when he is judged.

verses.plain: Wait on the LORD, and keep his way, and he shall exalt thee to inherit the land: when the wicked are cut off, thou shalt see it.

tokens.t: Wait on the
, and keep his way, and he shall exalt thee to inherit the land: when the wicked are cut off, thou shalt see

verses.plain: I have seen the wicked in great power, and spreading himself like a green bay tree.

tokens.t: I have seen the wicked in great power, and spreading himself like a green bay tree.

verses.plain: Yet he passed away, and, lo, he was not: yea, I sought him, but he could not be found.

tokens.t: Yet he passed away, and, lo, he
not: yea, I sought him, but he could not be found.

verses.plain: Mark the perfect man, and behold the upright: for the end of that man is peace.

tokens.t: Mark the perfect
, and behold the upright: for the end of
man
peace.

verses.plain: But the transgressors shall be destroyed together: the end of the wicked shall be cut off.

tokens.t: But the transgressors shall be destroyed together: the end of the wicked shall be cut off.

verses.plain: But the salvation of the righteous is of the LORD: he is their strength in the time of trouble.

tokens.t: But the salvation of the righteous
of the
their strength in the time of trouble.

verses.plain: And the LORD shall help them, and deliver them: he shall deliver them from the wicked, and save them, because they trust in him.

tokens.t: And the
shall help them, and deliver them: he shall deliver them from the wicked, and save them, because they trust in him.

footnotes.text: verily: Heb. in truth, or, stableness
Commit…: Heb. Roll thy way upon
Rest in: Heb. Be silent to
such…: Heb. the upright of way
a green…: or, a green tree that groweth in his own soil
